text: aap keh di jiye ke mujh ko is se mumaaniyath ki gayi hai ke un ki ibaadath karo, jin ko tum log Allah taâ€™ala ko chohd kar pukaarte ho, aap keh di jiye ke main tumhaari qaahishaat ki itteba na karonga kyo ke is haalath mein to main be-raah ho jaonga aur raah raasth par chalne waalo mein na rahonga
